question: Which among the following is the correct definition of Real Burden of Tax
option1: The reduction in the disposable income to the tax payers
option2: Amount of tax being paid by the taxpayers to the authorities
option3: Additional expenses incurred by the taxpayers, in addition to the amount paid to the authorities
option4: The Loss of the welfare to the taxpayers and the community as a whole
answer: The Loss of the welfare to the taxpayers and the community as a whole
